articles.title: Key Resolve, Foal Eagle 16 Condemned by Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Key Resolve, Foal Eagle 16 Condemned by Koreans in Russia
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia issued a statement on March 14 to denounce the U.S. and other hostile forces for their nuclear war drills against the DPRK.
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities' war moves have reached their height in the on-going Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military drills, the statement said.
					
					 All the peace-loving countries in the world support the counteraction taken by the DPRK to defend its sovereignty and dignity under the prevailing grave situation, it noted.

articles.title: Number of Animals on Increase in Central Zoo
articles.content:
Number of Animals on Increase in Central Zoo
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Scores of animals of 10-odd species have recently arrived at the Central Zoo of the DPRK.
					 Among those animals, all of them presented by servicepersons and civilians across the country, are a goshawk (Accipiter gentiles, the national bird), sea-cat and seal.
					
					 The goshawk weighs 1 kg and is 56.5 cm and 106 cm in length and wingspread respectively.
					
					 The new comers also include Athene noctua, snapping turtle, two bears, water-deer, goral and moorhen.

articles.title: Tideland Reclamation Projects Progress Apace in DPRK
articles.content:
Tideland Reclamation Projects Progress Apace in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The reclamation of tideland has been dynamically pushed forward in the DPRK as part of the efforts to greet the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with unprecedented labor achievements.
					 The project to build the dyke No. 2 is carried on at its final stage in the Nunggumdo tideland. After its completion, there will appear over 1,000 hectares of culture ground.
					
					 Since the start of the ongoing 70-day campaign, they succeeded in blasting 60,000 cubic meter earth twice and carried out thousands of cubic meters of filling and thousands of square meters of stoning in a little over 20 days.
					
					 Such successes have been witnessed in the reclamation of the Honggondo tideland.
					
					 The builders successfully blasted 300,000 cubic meter earth in the area of Sokhwa while carrying out their daily quota at 250 percent in stoning dyke No. 4. If the project is completed, more than 4,500 hectares of tideland will be reclaimed into farmland.
					
					 The same is true of the Ryongmaedo tideland reclamation project.

articles.title: Field Service Activities Active in DPRK
articles.content:
Field Service Activities Active in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Restaurants under the General Bureau of Public Service of the DPRK have offered field service with the 70-day campaign as a momentum.
					 Taking the lead in it are those from the Pyongyang Noodle House, the Okryu Restaurant, the restaurant under the Pyongyang Seafoods Department Store and the restaurants under the Changgwang Public Service Management Bureau.
					
					 They have visited factories and enterprises to inspire workers to increased production with well-known national cuisines, while conducting agitation activities on the spot.
					
					 Meanwhile, the restaurants have feasted labor innovators on special foods.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary on Nature of Situation Prevailing on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary on Nature of Situation Prevailing on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- A renowned expert on international law recently asserted that it is not the DPRK but the U.S. which threatens peace as the latter poses military threat to the former to bring it down.
					 This is a right view on the nature of the situation on the Korean peninsula now inching closer to the brink of a nuclear war due to the U.S.
					
					 The world is now following the situation on the peninsula with deep concern.
					
					 The U.S. is making last-ditch efforts to plunge the peninsula into a nuclear disaster while staging largest-ever hysteric war drills with huge nuclear weapons and special operation forces involved.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are pulling the wool over the eyes of the world public with their nonsensical claim that the DPRK is threatening peace though they have turned south Korea into a theater of horrible nuclear war.
					
					 It is not the independent DPRK but the U.S. which is harassing peace on the peninsula as it is working hard to stifle the former, regarding it as thorn in its flesh.
					
					 An article posted on the Canadian website Global Research on March 8 commented that the DPRK has never been in peace owing to the ceaseless joint military drills and harsh sanctions of the U.S. and the south Korean sides against it, adding that it is because the former is struggling against imperialism while adhering to its own principle, and advancing along the road chosen by itself.
					
					 The Obama government has pursued the policy of "strategic patience" in the whole period of its office to isolate and stifle the DPRK. Taken aback by the might of the dynamically advancing DPRK, Washington is seeking a way out in launching a nuclear war.
					
					 The madcap Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military drills now underway in south Korea are the most undisguised and unprecedented war rehearsals for invading the north as they involve almost all three types of strategic nuclear striking means of the U.S.
					
					 Kicking off the largest-ever madcap joint military drills throughout south Korea, pursuant to the dangerous war scenario aimed to strike the supreme leadership of the DPRK and "bring down its social system", the warmongers have entered the phase of carrying out "the scenario for attack drill part 2" since March 14.
					
					 The keynote of the "scenario" which escalated the above-said joint military drills is an "operation for advance into the northern inland area" targeting the strategic key area of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. forces present in south Korea test-fired M270A1 in the area near the Military Demarcation Line on March 9 as a back-up rehearsal of the on-going joint military drills, pursuant to their scenario to scorch various areas of the DPRK.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK were quite just when they kept themselves fully ready to mount a preemptive attack to cope with the ever more undisguised moves of the hostile forces for a nuclear war.
					
					 It is a suicidal act for the U.S. to calculate that it can test against the DPRK the mean special operations the former staged in various countries in the past.
					
					 The world will clearly see what miserable end the aggressors, provocateurs will meet for resorting to the reckless moves to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and "bring down its social system."

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Joint Military Exercises of U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Joint Military Exercises of U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers 
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article brands Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises as the worst military provocation to the DPRK and part of the moves to stifle it and their climax as they are now under way under the simulated conditions of a preemptive nuclear strike at it.
					 The U.S. and its south Korean stooges never wish to see the inter-Korean relations improve to pave the way for peace and independent reunification, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has pursued aggression of the DPRK and supremacy in Northeast Asia. It seeks to further justify its military presence in the region by escalating the confrontation and tension between the north and the south and contain the countries around the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Meanwhile, the group of traitors in south Korea are bedeviling the inter-Korean relations in collusion with foreign forces and making desperate efforts to stifle the fellow countrymen in the north and realize the wild ambition to "bring down its social system" under this pretext.
					
					 They are, however, sadly mistaken.
					
					 If they show even a slight sign of operation to infringe upon the dignity of the supreme leadership and sovereignty of the DPRK, all its striking means will blow up the strongholds of aggression at a single blow.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Collectivist Emulation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Collectivist Emulation 
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The on-going general advance is a great offensive to bring about a great leap forward and innovations by displaying popular heroism and a fierce charge for achieving greater wellbeing and victory through a hot emulation.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in an editorial Saturday.
					
					 It is necessary to give full rein to popular heroism and perform unprecedented labor feats in the 70-day campaign to glorify the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea as a glorious one of victors, holding aloft the communist slogan "One for all and all for one!", the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 The hot  collectivist emulation represents not only fierce flames combating indolence and slackness and making a clean sweep of outdated ideological hangovers such as flunkeyism, experientialism, self-protection and conservatism but also strong wind which redoubles the DPRK' might of self-development.
					
					 Indolence and slackness are like the arch enemy disarming people ideologically and morally and outdated ideological survivals such as flunkeyism, experientialism, self-protection and conservatism hinder their advance.
					
					 Socialist emulation represents the most effective method of giving full play to revolutionary enthusiasm and creative ingenuity of the masses.  The emulation helps people work and live in a revolutionary and militant manner and possess the firm will to stand up, believing in their own strength only, in the course for enlisting all potentials and inner reserves to the maximum and bringing about uninterrupted innovations and progress and ceaseless offensive. 
					
					 All the officials, party members and other working people are required to wage a hot collectivist emulation in the 70-day campaign and achieve unprecedentedly signal labor achievements and thus make hurrah for victory resound far and wide in May, concludes the editorial.

articles.title: Enemies' Last-ditch Efforts Bound to Lead to Their Final Ruin: Papers
articles.content:
Enemies' Last-ditch Efforts Bound to Lead to Their Final Ruin: Papers
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The enemies should bear in mind that their "beheading operation" for getting the sun eclipsed by the palms is bound to lead to their final doom, say newspapers here Saturday.
					 Rodong Sinmun says in an article that the DPRK's bolstering of deterrence for self-defense pronounces the final bankruptcy of the U.S. imperialists' scenario to threaten and blackmail against the DPRK and their strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific and the rest of the world.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 As the DPRK's deterrent for self-defence has remarkably grown stronger, the U.S. imperialists' policy of occupying south Korea is the root cause of extremely endangering the security of the U.S. mainland.
					
					 Much upset by this, they are making last-ditch efforts to put the unfavorable situation under their control, pinning hope on their reckless "beheading operation."
					
					 They are claiming that their special operation is the only option, a proof that their scenario to pose a threat through "their military and technical advantages" and their strategy for world domination through invasion have gone bust.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK devotedly defending Marshal Kim Jong Un regard the U.S. imperialists' outrageous special operation as a declaration of a war.
					
					 All the ultra-modern strike means of the DPRK accurately aim at the strongholds of aggression.
					
					 The U.S. mainland is within their firing range. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists had better behave with prudence, bearing in mind that their last reckless gambling would only wring their neck.
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary stresses that the aggressors and provocateurs keen on the last dangerous saber-rattling can never be safe under the sky.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Hits Out at Park Geun Hye's Invectives against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Hits Out at Park Geun Hye's Invectives against DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Days ago, traitor Park Geun Hye summoned her stooges to Chongwadae and urged them to "make full preparations" to cope with the DPRK's measures to bolster up nuclear deterrence for self-defence.
					 Earlier, she convened a meeting of "chiefs of diplomatic and consular offices in foreign countries" at which she spouted such malignant vituperation as "tyrannical policy" and cried out for "decisive and harsh sanctions and counteraction of international community." 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is nothing but the vitriol revealed by the old witch without any measure, frightened by the ceaseless toughest offensive of the DPRK.
					
					 Park is going busy with anti-north "sanctions" and nuclear war exercises backed by her U.S. master.
					
					 The group of traitors is now in the grip of the extreme ruling crisis as mass actions of people of different social standings against the unpopular rule of Park and her moves to revive "yusin" dictatorship are gaining in scope and strength in south Korea. 
					
					 Wretched is the position of Park as she finds none of her internal affairs going properly and she cannot sleep in peace even a moment because of the spirit of the great Paektusan nation to punish her.
					
					 She spouted a whole string of invectives against the north, angered so much by the total failure of whatever done by her that she was not aware of her skirt falling down. But this is nothing but desperate fit of the witch more dead than alive.
					
					 Her rhetoric only invites sneers from all people.

articles.title: S. Koreans Call for Impeaching Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
S. Koreans Call for Impeaching Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The Committee for Founding the Alliance for Democracy and Reunification of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on March 13 at which it called for impeaching Park Geun Hye, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo. 
					 Speakers at the conference said that they would disclose and criticize the crimes of the chief executive through the upcoming general elections and make efforts to get the privileges of the lawmakers scrapped.
					
					 Anti-Park sentiments are getting stronger among south Koreans of various circles as they are angered by her regime's fascist and repressive rule and policies of depending on outsiders and escalating confrontation with compatriots in the north.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Call for Eliminating Pro-U.S. Forces in S. Korea
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Call for Eliminating Pro-U.S. Forces in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany made public a statement on March 15, calling for eliminating pro-U.S. lackeys in south Korea.
					 Recalling that the Syngman Rhee regime, group of pro-U.S. forces and traitors, staged the fraudulent election 56 years ago, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime is undisguisedly revealing its attempt for long-term office.
					
					 Park buckled down to enacting a "law on preventing cyber terrorism" in the wake of forcibly adopting the "anti-terrorism law" under the pretext of "threat from the north" and is working hard to promote the Intelligence Service to an unchallenged power body.
					
					 The statement called for punishing the above-said forces without fail in the general elections to come.

articles.title: S. Korean Businessmen, Workers Protest Regime
articles.content:
S. Korean Businessmen, Workers Protest Regime
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- A protest action took place in the area around Rimjin Pavilion, Phaju City, Kyonggi Province of south Korea on March 16 to protest against the Park Geun Hye group of traitors which totally suspended the operation in the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ), according to south Korean MBC. It was sponsored by the KIZ Emergency Measure Committee.
					 Participating in it were employees of the enterprises that operated in the KIZ and relevant ones and their family members, more than 1 000 in all.
					
					 Holding protest slogans, the participants expressed irrepressible anger at the Park group which caused enormous damage to south Korean businessmen and workers through a suicidal action.
					
					 They charged that entrepreneurs and relevant ones and over 124 000 persons were hit by the regime's step for shutting down the KIZ.
					
					 They demanded the authorities not drive weak enterprises to a bottomless pitfall any longer but institute a special law on compensation and immediately make compensation to them.
					
					 Then the participants conducted a signature campaign and staged a demonstration.
					
					 On March 14 the Consultative Council of Working People of Kaesong Industrial Zone staged a demonstration at the Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" on its website on March 14.
					 The work published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for firmly defending the idea and exploits of the President and Kim Jong Il and adding shine to them forever.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Observed in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Observed in Russia
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed by the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK on March 12.
					 Lebedev, chief of the group was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to post on website the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung and hold diverse events such as a seminar and film show on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Belarus
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Belarus
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- A Belarusian joint organizing committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed on March 14 under the sponsorship of the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					 L. Shukolinikov, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus and chairman of the Standing Presidium of the above-said association, was elected chairman of the organizing committee.
					
					 The committee decided to send a message of greeting to Marshal Kim Jong Un, give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of the President and organize colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Brazil-People's Korea Study Group Formed
articles.content:
Brazil-People's Korea Study Group Formed
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The Brazil-People's Korea Study Group was formed in Rio Grande Do Sul State, Brazil on March 9.
					 Joao Herminio was elected chairman of the group.
					
					 He said in a speech at an inaugural ceremony that the group would conduct positive activities for informing the Brazilian people of the true picture of socialist Korea, which has become a primary target of the U.S. imperialists and western media's smear campaign.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Nuclear War Drills Slammed by Guinean, Polish Bodies
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Nuclear War Drills Slammed by Guinean, Polish Bodies
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Guinean and Polish bodies released statements on March 11 and 13 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces for kicking off the reckless nuclear war rehearsals.
					 The Guinea-Korea Friendship Association said:
					
					 The U.S is staging the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military maneuvers together with south Korea by involving huge forces. The drills are dangerous war drills for aggression to all intents and purposes.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy for stifling the DPRK and immediately halt the reckless war drills disturbing peace on the Korean peninsula and in other parts of the region.
					
					 If the U.S. again ignites a war on the Korean peninsula, it will face a humiliating defeat bitterer than what it met in the past Korean War.
					
					 The U.S. should accept the DPRK's fair demand in order to ensure lasting peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The Polish branch of the Korean Friendship Association said that the above-said war drills are undisguised maneuvers of aggression targeting the DPRK.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The U.S. is openly talking about its "operation to advance into Pyongyang."
					
					 Therefore, it is quite natural that the DPRK has made preparations to defend itself.

articles.title: U.S. Moves against DPRK Denounced by Belarusian Political Parties, Organizations
articles.content:
U.S. Moves against DPRK Denounced by Belarusian Political Parties, Organizations
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Belarusian political parties and organizations including the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus and the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il released a joint statement on March 5.
					 The statement termed "resolution on sanctions" cooked up by the UN Security Council against the DPRK under pressure of the U.S. imperialists wanton infringement upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and its people's right to existence.
					
					 The U.S. is persistently putting political and military pressure upon the DPRK, not dropping its wild ambition to invade it, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. is kicking up large-scale war exercises against the DPRK every year together with the south Korean puppet forces and is resorting to smear campaigns against the DPRK.
					
					 Especially, it is leaving no means untried to stifle the DPRK, taking issue with it over its bolstering of self-defensive nuclear deterrent.
					
					 The UNSC's hostile "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK is aimed to realize the U.S. imperialists' wild ambition for aggression.
					
					 The U.S. is openly crying out for mounting a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 We denounce the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. should stop the nuclear war exercises, conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK and withdraw its aggression troops from south Korea.

articles.title: Japanese Personage Urges U.S., South Korea to Stop War Drills against DPRK
articles.content:
Japanese Personage Urges U.S., South Korea to Stop War Drills against DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- It should never be forgotten that the DPRK is possessed of miniaturized nuclear weapons.
					 Takashi Nada, representative of the Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan, was quoted as saying this in an article posted on a website on March 8.
					
					 The main purpose of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military drills is to verify the feasibility of the OPLAN 5015, the article noted, adding:
					
					 The keynote of the OPLAN 5015 is the "beheading operation" targeting the supreme leadership of the DPRK and the "operation for eliminating" its nuclear and strategic rocket forces.
					
					 Special operation forces of the U.S. Army, Navy, Marines and Air Force flocked to south Korea all at once to carry out the scenarios.
					
					 The Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army in its crucial statement said that all the powerful strategic and tactical strike means of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will go into preemptive operation of justice to thoroughly neutralize the moves of the enemy forces if there is a slight sign of their special operation forces and equipment moving to carry out the "beheading operation" and "high-density strike."
					
					 The primary target is Chongwadae and reactionary ruling machines.
					
					 The second target is the U.S. forces' bases for invading the DPRK in the Asia-Pacific region and the U.S. mainland.
					
					 The U.S. had better seriously consider the DPRK's warnings and immediately stop the joint military drills being staged together with south Korea.

articles.title: DPRK's Self-Defensive Measures Supported by Figures of South African, Peru
articles.content:
DPRK's Self-Defensive Measures Supported by Figures of South African, Peru
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Figures of South Africa and Peru issued statements on March 9 and 11 in support of the DPRK's just measures for self-defence.
					 A regional chairman of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party fully supported the DPRK's building of nuclear force, saying that the U.S. should stop abusing the name of the UN.
					
					 Julio Cesar Pantigoso Barretto, chairman of the branches of Chiclayo and Trujillo of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship, said:
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the DPRK government and people showing the steadfast will to firmly defend the sovereignty of the country now that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces are staging the provocative nuclear war drills.
					
					 We consider it is just that the DPRK government and people are taking such self-defensive steps as developing latest weapons to deal a deadly blow to the U.S. imperialists, the first enemy of mankind.
					
					 We will always stand by the Korean people struggling against the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Injustice of UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK Disclosed by British Figure
articles.content:
Injustice of UNSC's "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK Disclosed by British Figure
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Dermot Hudson, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association UK, dedicated an article to The New Worker, the organ of the New Communist Party of Britain, on March 12.
					 He said that the UN Security Council cooked up the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK under the pretext of its self-defensive H-bomb test and legitimate satellite launch, touching off public resentment.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Such "resolution" is a denial of the sovereignty of the DPRK and a declaration of a war against it.
					
					 This can not be viewed otherwise than an attempt to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 All the "resolutions on sanctions" against the DPRK have been fabricated by the U.S. and its followers to block the independent development of the DPRK and bring down its socialist system.
					
					 The UNSC had already lost its impartiality and reduced to the U.S. puppet, rubber seal and fascist police.
					
					 The article called upon the international community to conduct a dynamic movement for defending the DPRK and opposing the UNSC's "resolution on sanction" against it.

articles.title: DPRK's Just Stance Supported by Polish Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Just Stance Supported by Polish Organization
 Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a statement on March 13 in support of the DPRK's just stand as regards the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" against it.
					 Saying that the UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK is only escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula, the statement stressed that the U.S. increasing nuclear threat compelled the DPRK to have access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 Therefore, the DPRK's accession to the nuclear weapons is a due product of the U.S. hostile policy toward the former, the statement added.
					
					 Noting that the only key to the solution of the issue of the Korean peninsula is to hold negotiations without any precondition, it urged the U.S. to opt for concluding a peace treaty with the DPRK.

articles.title: Enviados animales a Parque Zoologico Nacional
articles.content:
Enviados animales a Parque Zoologico Nacional
Pyongyang, 19 de marzo (ACNC) -- Los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares enviaron al Parque Zoologico Nacional de Corea  decenas de animales de mas de 10 especies.
					A fines de enero pasado, los militares enviaron el azor, ave nacional de Corea.
					
					El azor pesa mas o menos 1kg y la longitud total de su cuerpo mide 56.5cm y la de las alas desplegadas, 106cm.
					
					Los pescadores enviaron una foca y un leon marino capturados en enero y febrero.
					
					Entre los animales se ven ademas la lechuza enviada por la Filial de Ingenieria Arquitectonica del municipio Unjong de la ciudad de Pyongyang, la tortuga donada por la Facultad de Lenguas Extranjeras de la Universidad Kim Il Sung y dos osos enviados por la Direccion Alimentaria y de Articulos de Uso Diario del Comite Popular de la ciudad de Sunchon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					
					Fueron enviados tambien Hydropotes inermis, gamuza, falaris y otros animales.
